S04sukhvylu:1444: anye punar upapādukāḥ paryaṅkaiḥ padmeṣu prādurbhavanti.
S04sukhvylu:1445: bhagavān āha : ye te 'jita bodhisattvā anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S04sukhvylu:1449: teṣām atra garbhāvāso bhavati. ye punar nirvicikitsāś cchinnakāṃkṣāḥ
S04sukhvylu:1453: padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti. ye te 'jita bodhisattvā
S04sukhvylu:1456: na vicikitsām utpādayanti, na kāṃkṣanty asaṅgabuddhajñānaṃ,
S04sukhvylu:1462: prajñāparīttatāṃ, yatra hi nāma pañcavarṣaśatāni parihīṇā

S04sukhvylu:1480: darśanīyaḥ. sa tatrābhiniṣaṇṇo vābhinipanno vā bhavet. bahu
S04sukhvylu:1482: tat kiṃ manyase 'jita ; udāras tasya rājaputrasya sa paribhogo
S04sukhvylu:1483: bhavet. āha : udāro bhagavan. bhagavān āha : tat kiṃ
S04sukhvylu:1484: manyase 'jita ; api tv āsvādayet, sa tan nigamayed vā,
S04sukhvylu:1485: tena vā tuṣṭiṃ vidyāt. āha : no hīdaṃ bhagavan. api tu

S04sukhvylu:1487: prakṣipto bhavet, sa tato mokṣam evākāṃkṣayet. abhijātān

S04sukhvylu:1491: nābhiratiḥ. nātra parimucyate, yāvan na rājā prasādam upadarśayati.

S04sukhvylu:1497: paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti. api tu padmeṣu garbhāvāse

S04sukhvylu:1505: tatra nābhiramante, na tuṣṭiṃ vidanti. api tu khalu punaḥ

S04sukhvylu:1509: paśyājita ; yatra hi nāma pañcabhir varṣaśatair bahūni
S04sukhvylu:1512: buddhadharmāś ca parigṛhītavyāḥ. tat sarvaṃ vicikitsādoṣeṇa
S04sukhvylu:1515: tasmāt tarhy ajita ; bodhisattvair nirvicikitsair bodhāya
S04sukhvylu:1520: evam ukte, 'jito bodhisattvo bhagavantam etad avocat :

S04sukhvylu:1523: ye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante. bhagavān āha :
